item.title: Blessings of the Gospel Available to All
item.description:
Blessings of the Gospel Available to All by Elder Joseph W. Sitati, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 179th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2009
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Joseph W. Sitati, Of the Seventy

item.title: Be Fruitful, Multiply, and Subdue the Earth
item.description:

item.title: Patterns of Discipleship
item.description:
